name: Go Fight Fantastic!
storyline: Fast-paced. Light-hearted. Vibrantly hand-drawn. Fight across treacherous marshlands, steep summits and picturesque settlements and meet an imaginative cast of friends and foes along the way. A unique touch is added to each playthrough by a degree of randomized level composition, enemy encounters, and upgrade drops.
summary: Go Fight Fantastic! is a 3-player Action-RPG with heavy focus on teamwork and co-operation! Play as three unique characters (Tank, Striker or Healer), each with his/her own set of abilities - both over the Internet or with friends at home (couch co-op).
